metadata.synopsis: Enthralled by Cazador guard is un-charmed by the player.Different reaction for when uncharmed in combat / outside combat.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe debugbookGo To Region - Act 3 - LOW - Cazador's Palace - Guard TowerKill all the guards except for this one with Ctrl+Shift+K. Then start a fight with this guard.

0.speaker: Jaryd
0.text: No one may enter. The master forbids it!
